title: Jimbot Commands
description:
(replace ? with your servers prefix)
Quotations are required around parameters
​

fields.name: Get Top DPS
fields.value:
- **?topdps** *[optional category]*
- category: physical, magic, hybrid
Get the top 10 DPS for GL. no parameter will return the top 10 from all categories. Provide a category to only show the units of that type.
​

fields.name: Post Furcula Unit Builds
fields.value:
- **?build** *[unit_name]*
Display the build used by Furcula's Damage Calculations
- example: **?build malphasie**
​

fields.name: Post Whale Unit Builds
fields.value:
- **?bis** *[unit_name]*
Display the build used by ShadoWalker's Damage Calculations
- example: **?bis malphasie**
​

fields.name: Builds as text
fields.value:
- **?buildtext**, **?bistext**
Same as above, but output the build as text
​

fields.name: Compact Build
fields.value:
Append the leter 'c' to any build related command to make it compact.
- example: **?buildc elena**
​

fields.name: Get Unit Calculations
fields.value:
- **?damage** *[unit name -or- category]*
Return all damage calculations for a single unit.
- example: **?dpt Elena**
​

fields.name: Get Furcula Unit Calculations
fields.value:
- **?dpt** *[unit name -or- category]*
- **?burst** *[unit name -or- category]*
You can search for multiple units at once by separating the names with a pipe( | ) character.
- example: **?dpt Esther | Elena**
​

fields.name: Get Unit Rotation
fields.value:
- **?rot** *[unit name]*
Return an optimal rotation for the unit provided.
- example: **?rot zeno**
​

fields.name: Get ShadoWalker Whale Unit Calculations
fields.value:
- **?wdpt** *[unit name]*
- **?wburst** *[unit name]*
- **?wrot** *[unit name]*
Derived from Furculas sheet, all builds are instead geared with several STMR's in mind.
​

fields.name: Get ShadoWalker's List of Top DPT Units
fields.value:
- **?wtopdpt** *[optional category]* *"[optional limit]"*
- category: physical, magic, hybrid
- example: **?mtopdpt physical**
​

fields.name: Get Muspels Damage Calculation
fields.value:
- **?muspel** *[name]*
Much like the above command, it will return a units damage calculated using Muspels criteria.
- example: **?muspel elena**

fields.name: Get Muspel's List of Top DPT Units
fields.value:
- **?mtopdpt** *[optional category]* *"[optional limit]"*
- category: physical, magic, hybrid
- example: **?mtopdpt magical "15"**
​

fields.name: Get Whatah's Damage Calculations
fields.value:
- **?jpdpt** *[name]*
Return the corresponding units' Damage Per Turn from Whatah's Damage Calculations sheet.
- example: **?jpdpt cloud**

fields.name: Get Whatah's Burst Damage Calculations
fields.value:
- **?jpburst** *[name]*
Return the corresponding units' Highest Burst Damage from Whatah's Damage Calculations shee.
- example: **?jpburst cloud**

fields.name: Get Whatah's List of Top DPT Units
fields.value:
- **?jptopdpt** *[optional category]* *"[optional limit]"*
- category: physical, magic, hybrid
- example: **?jptopdpt "5"**
​
